author: stefan2
msg: Fix / silence a few integer conversion warnings in FSX.
(svn_fs_x__read_noderevs_container): Cast to entry counts to APR index type.
Since the size of the whole container
is limited to a few MB, there is no way
to have more than 2G entries in it.

msg: MaxAge should be honored upon borrow as well, to assure that no connection is ever used if it has been connected longer than designated time.
